entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Periods of snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
